en: The flickering screen displays an image.
The eye reflects where you started.
The flower looks like it wants something.
The crystal has an indent of a certain bug.
Could you bring me some snacks?
I will pay you, of course.
Is walking not good enough for you?
Press and hold [INTERACT] to block distractions.
Don't know how to catch bugs?
Sit still, and wait for the exclamation mark to appear. Then press [INTERACT] to begin focusing.
There is an absence in our possession. Please fulfill our request.
Help me catch the winged ones.
There is true focus hidden inside you...
C-can you h-help me with something?
There are bugs. So many. You have?
Guess who's still stuck in a crystal. It's me! And I'm hungryyyyy...
The crystals are as pleased as I am. Do you hear them sing?
There is so much to dig through! Found anything good?
Ah yes, this will do nicely.
All of them, so eeelusive... Hiding in the weeeds...
If you think about it... Being stuck is just an opportunity to ask for help.
I live to lie here another day.
Sigh... Yeah, I saw the message from HR.
I'm not going to chew you out over it, since I'm really just here to relax.
Let's just get you on to the next task. There's a bug in our system, and I need you to find it.
It's messing with our data, so please find it and turn it in ASAP!
I don't appreciate having my vacation disturbed!
You need to focus on the task.
Oh, there you are, dear. I've been waiting for you.
I've been thinking long about how you can show your dedication to this relationship.
You need to get me something new. Something that sparkles. Something beautiful.
Then gift it to me. That way I will know that you truly care about me.
Are you ready to show that you love me?
You need to focus on this relationship, or we're done!
If it isn't my hard-working pupil, Froggy!
Listen, don't worry about your prior performance. We're going to get you back on the horse again.
Currently I'm researching an increased surge of life. There are bugs everywhere!
Something must be causing this anomaly. Please investigate and return with your findings.
Have you come upon any results?
Now, I don't mean to lecture you, but...
It's important that you focus on your studies.
